Generation IV.Diamond: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
Generation IV.Pearl: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
Generation IV.Platinum: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

Generation V.Black: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
Generation V.White: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
Generation V.Black 2: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
Generation V.White 2: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.

Generation VI.X: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
Generation VI.Y: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

Generation VIII.Sword: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
Generation VIII.Shield: The deeper a Cherubi's red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients and shriveled, evolution is near.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Once the fruit growing alongside the main body is large and plump, Cherubi will use the nutrients within to evolve. The fruit then detaches, becoming nourishment for other creatures.
